question: Do I need to be from Sao Paulo to participate in the event
answer: No we are happy with participants from all over brasil. If you need a financial support for travelling to Sao Paulo you can apply for a grant during the registration process.

question: How much is the travel grant and when will the money be paid back?
answer: You can only apply for a travel grant if you are a student and don't have a regular income. The exact amount depends on your area of living. The exact amount will be shown during the registration process. Pleas keep in mind that you get the reimbursment only after the event.

question: Which language will be used during the event
answer: The main language for the event is english. But of course all important informations will be both in english and portugese as well. The team of mentors and organisators is a mixed language team speaking german, english and portugese.

question: I have further questions. How can I reach the organizers?
answer: You can send us an email to info@edtechhack.org
